messages.title: It's a two horse race: Labour or Tory.
messages.content: Don't let the Tories in the back door.

mentions.tacticalSituation: People here in Lanark, Hamilton East and surrounding villages know what the Tories did last time and that they haven't changed. Only a vote for Labour can stop the Tories getting in by the back door - a vote for any other Party or not voting at all will only help the Tories.

contactInformation.address: Campaign Office, c/o Jim Hood at 16 C1ove Mill Wynd, Larkhall

endorsements.endorsement: I don't want the Tories back because... I don't trust them to look after our local economies and attract much needed jobs and investment to our area.
I don't want the Tories back because... They don't understand Scotland. They don't understand working people. If they did they wouldn't have given us the poll tax.
I don't want the Tories back because... Thatcher is renowned for stealing our milk. Underneath David Cameron's spin there's just the same old Tories.
I don't want the Tories back because... I'm a pensioner and I value the winter fuel allowance, pension credits, and free bus passes. The Tories are a change we simply cannot afford.

images.caption: It's a two horse race: Labour or Tory. Don't let the Tories in the back door.
